BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 020259Z JUN
   BY M/V NPS RAMFORM SOVEREING TOWING 14
   8100 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-41.52S 041-50.80W, 25-07.10S 042-58.12W,
   24-01.78S 043-28.42W, 24-10.62S 042-10.30W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1128/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 020359Z JUN.
